sentences.en: " I told a fib about my age, " little Tom said.
sentences.cn: “ 有关我的年龄我撒了个谎, ” 小汤姆说.

sentences.en: Above tunnel, buy breaks sell at fib numbers.
sentences.cn: 隧道之上, 买突破,在费那滋数列位置平仓.

sentences.en: Aprotinin did not influence the Fib and TEG of group A.
sentences.cn: 抑肽酶对A组的纤维蛋白原(Fib)、TEG指标无显著影响(P>0.05).

sentences.en: Below tunnel, sell rallies , buy at fib numbers.
sentences.cn: 在隧道之下, 卖出, 在费那滋数列位置买回.

sentences.en: But also consider your partner's personality and, if you are the fibber, why you fib.
sentences.cn: 然而,你还要考虑到伴侣的性格, 如果是你在说瞎话, 你又为什么要说说瞎话.

sentences.en: Filter Material: Nylon fib red synthetic resin.
sentences.cn: 过滤材料: 尼龙纤维合成树脂.

sentences.en: He felt guilty and was trying to fiB out of it.
sentences.cn: 他觉得内心有愧,想扯谎蒙混过去.

sentences.en: He said:'Parents should not be alarmed if chellold tells a fib.
sentences.cn: 他说,要是孩子只是说个小谎的话,大人是无须担心的.

sentences.en: He told a fib about eating his spinach.
sentences.cn: 他撒了个小谎说吃了菠菜.

sentences.en: He’s been known to tell fibs .
Her clumsy fib had let him see that she had something to conceal.
sentences.cn: 她那愚蠢的谎言已使他猜出她在隐瞒什么.

sentences.en: Micron - sized cantilever beams of a 304 steel were fabricated by focused - ion - beam ( FIB ).
sentences.cn: 采用聚焦 离子束溅射 蚀刻加工了微米尺寸304不锈钢悬臂梁试样.

sentences.en: Nostalgia is, in the end, a seductive and sentimental fib.
sentences.cn: 怀旧最终不过是种诱人的、多情的谎言.

sentences.en: Results: After acute high - altitude, PT, TT, APTT, DD increased and FIB, Plg, plasmin inhibitor decreased ( P < 0.05 ).
sentences.cn: 结果: 进入高原后, PT 、 TT 、 APTT 、 DD比在平原时增高,FIB 、 Plg 、 纤溶酶抑制物降低 ( P<0.05 ).

sentences.en: Use previous fib numbers in the move as stop loss points.
sentences.cn: 用前面的费那滋位置止损.
我们扯谎是为了避免冲突.

words.tran_cn: 撒小谎者；惯撤小谎的人

trans.tran_cn: 小谎，无关紧要的谎话，惯撒小谎的人
